content: Please provide a [Java code] that randomly generates a three-word sentence from a list of adjectives, nouns, and verbs. The adjectives list includes "colorful", "lovely", "beautiful", "gorgeous", and "charming". The nouns list includes "nest", "flower", "rainbow", "butterfly", and "sunshine". The verbs list includes "dances", "sparkles", "shines", "glows", and "smiles". The output sentence should be in the format of "adjective + noun + verb" and should be printed to the console. Can you provide a solution for this?
